en.title: Dresscode
en.subTitle: Beach Formal
paragraphs: Dress to impress, but also dress for the elements (sun, sand and water).  Anything you would wear to a nice restaurant on a summer day is appropiate.
Her: A more formal sundress with flat sandals.

es.title: Vestimenta
es.subTitle: Playa Formal
paragraphs: Viste para impresionar y los elementos (sol, arena y agua).  Cualquier cosa que vestirías para un buen restaurante en un día de verano es apropiado.
Ellas: Un vestido de sol formal con sandalias.
